content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from work on hwy 42 at 7:45 pm and saw a rectangle shape in the sky to my left and it was pulsating and the best i could tell it was not moving.It was just hanging there.I always look at the stars on a clear night ,but tonight there was something in the sky that i had never seen before ,it was a little bit rounded on the edges with lights going dim and bright but never went out . i didn't know what it was but it was not and airplane.Does anybody know what it was ? was there any military aircraft in the area at the time?Let me know if anyone else saw what 
i saw please.
content.summary: Rectangular  shape with lights pulsating

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking out my window at  4 - 4 30 am when i noticed a orange ball or round  objet that just appeared from nowhere right at the are i had my attention on it flew in a zig - zagging way one way then dissapeared to later appear coming back ,this time in a straight line then jus dissapeared . 
i had also seen a bright star like ufo that was on top of where i was for quite some time . i noticed this object (start_like) disk , not making any sound or movement , but i had the feeling something was looking at me from above . then after awhile the object turned of its light   and  then i noticed it was a a round circle  dark bluish no light and was now moving away from the spot it remained for about 45 min . this was 6 years ago . i was in whittier california . thats all i remembered about this one
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was a orange round  objet moving from one side to the other  easily

content.detailedDescription: Was driving w/my daugter near wheaton, maryland & she pointed out how the clouds looked very weird & wer forming the shape of a star around the sun.  it was an eerie look. we couldn't stop staring, we both felt there was something there, i pulled over and took pics from outside the car.  once reviewing the pics, in 2 of them there is a ball of light w/ red glow.  one pic there's an orb. they were all taken from the same spot and in the picture w/ the orb there's no red glow anywhere. all three pics taken seconds from each other. i don't think this is an effect from the sun because the sphere of light in the center is obvious and looks solid, also, the red glow takes different shapes in both pics and is in a slightly different position than the first.  also, i first tried to take a pic w/ my cell phone but it was acting up and started blinking like the battery wore off.
content.summary: Ball of light w/red irredescent glow around it in wheaton, maryland

content.detailedDescription:
I've decided to post this now, even though the event happened nearly 9 years ago.  i cannot remember exact dates, but again it was almost a decade ago.

my friends and i were camping at the lost park campground around june or july of 1999.  as we were sitting around the campfire at approximately 1am we saw a bright reddish light in the distance that seemed to be about a 1/2 mile away from us.  the object wasn't in the sky, but closer to the ground.  wondering what the light was, two of us took a quick hike to a nearby ridge to get a better look. 

at first i thought that it was another campfire as the object looked like a flame, but when we got a better look it was clear that the object was floating just above the trees; and it was lighting up the ground below it. it seemed to change shape and dance, sort of like how a flame moves and changes; and its colors were a bright reddish-orange-purple.

the object moved very slow and hovered around the same spot.  it's movement seemed deliberate, yet not really precise either (hence the 'dancing' motions). i could not distinguish any solid mass or any real shapes, as it literally looked like a flame yet it wasn't made of fire.  it seemed to be a flame of light.  there was absolutely no sounds from the object. 

the phenomenon lasted for what seemed like around 10 minutes; and then the object literally shot into the sky at speeds that i didn't think were possible.  the next part is was really scares me even to this day.

we went back to the campfire and started to talk about what we just saw.  i was noticeably tired at this point and when i looked at my watch it was 4am in the morning.  some how, three hours had gone by without anyone noticing - and i don't remember going anywhere except for watching the object for 10 minutes.

what was a 10 minute experience was actually 3 hours in real time.  i just can't explain it. 

there is no doubt that we were all a bit 'impaired' during the sighting/experience (who camps sober?) - but there is also no doubt that we all experienced the same thing.
content.summary: Flame type object seen while camping - missing time

content.detailedDescription: On that night of november 2003 i was walking down a trail then in the eastern sky a bright blue starlike object appeared out of nowhere it was heading east then it suddenly switched directions and shot toward the western sky and disappeared in about five seconds i was stunned i have never seen anything move so quickly
content.summary: Bright blue starlike object appears then disappears in about five seconds

content.detailedDescription: This was the best sighting of all the ufos that i've witnessed this object flew over my house i wish i would've taken a photo this object was moving fairly quick and the lights were flashing in a slow strange pattern that went all the away around it i know it wasn't a plane or a helicopter the object flew across the sky with no noise at all it was strange but not alarming i haven't seen this object since.
content.summary: Strange object with yellow flashing lights circling all the away around it

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on the roof of my house with my boyfriend right after midnight when i saw this bright red light appear out of nowhere. it was southwest of us (which is south of el cajon blvd approx). it was not too high off the ground above the houses and then a second one appeared after the first one disappeared to the left of it. at first i thought maybe it was a firecracker because at the time fireworks were going on around the county which we could see from our roof deck. these lights seemed different though because they were so bright and literally hovered in the air. i knew something was odd about them but i didn't take a picture. now i wish i had. it didn't move with the wind which i found odd as well because there was a decent breeze that night. the balls of light simply disappeared and reappeared. i went inside though after about 15 minutes after midnight so i do not know where the lights went from here. the distance of the lights from above the houses were about the height a helicopter would travel if it was looking for someone.
content.summary: Bright red lights hovering in san diego area south of el cajon blvd near sdsu

content.detailedDescription: Saw strange lights with light reflecting off the ocean.  and found a picture taken from a webcam on top of a condo facing jupiter inlet, florida.  attached is the picture!!
content.summary: Strange lights of jupiter inlet florida

content.detailedDescription: I walked out of the front door of my apt.  a local large bird flew over me and as it past, i saw the object moving at a high speed to the east. it made a 90% turn to the right and stopped.  it made a wobbly motion in a circle then shot up slightly to the south and disappeared. i am a fromer private flyer and have met in person major marcel in 1978.
content.summary: Object very high  25,000 ft. atleast

content.detailedDescription: I have found a under water very old ufo base. please che check this for me. thank you
content.summary: I have found a under water very old ufo base

content.detailedDescription: I watched fox six news this evening in san diego and saw the video of the ufo that was captured by a group of people near the city shortly after the new year.  i am writing because i saw the exact same thing on 12/6/07.  i live in an ocean view apartment in encinitas, ca.  at approx. 10-11 pm, i noticed a series of 8 or so evenly spaced lights moving up and down out over the ocean. they weren't that high in the air and were in the direction of san clemente island.  the brightness of each dot varied with intensity.  as soon as one would start to dim, it would then start to brighten again.  they were visible for just a couple of minutes.  i hope this can be explained.  if you need any additional information, feel free to call or email.  i verified the date by looking at my christmas tree receipt.  i am positive that the day is accurate.
content.summary: Series of 8 or so lights moving up and down in the direction of san clemente island

content.detailedDescription: This happened to my little sister who is 20 years old and has always thought my mom and i are weird for beleiving we wer getting visited every six months at this house.  this is her account of what happened:  "i opened my eyes and saw nothing but a bright, white light coming in thru the window, it encompassed my whole room.  i was paralyzed,stuck to the bed!! all i could move was my eyes!! i looked at the clock and it was exactly 3am. i was very scared, i couldn't speak.  suddenly i felt a release & the light was gone from da room so i looked out the window and there was a huge ball of light floating outside my window!! just a sphere, no windows, no sound, about the size of a car but it was moving around,then it dissapeared!!"....This is when she called me and was very afraid and panicky!!! when i lived with my mom in that house more than ten years ago, i used to have the same thing happen exactly every six months!!! my mom and i wer the only ones to experience it and no1 beleived us..Until one day my aunt came in as the light was coming in2 the room and interrupted, i was able to stand up and run outside..On top of our house was a huge black triangle with 3circular lights, 1 in each angle.  the lights turned off & the craft drifted away without making any sound.  it never returned..This is the 1st time anything like that has happened in a decade!!! i don't have any memories of being "abducted", but the lights and the being stuck 2da bed sure are things i'll never forget
content.summary: White bright light  was coming in thru the window giving a paralytic effect..Once able to move saw a bright ball of light about the size of a car floating outside of window

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of dec. 18, 2007, standing on a waterfront front porch of a rented cottage at the pelican landing resort on the indian river in sabastian, fl., i saw what first appeared to be a small, private airplane, in the sky directly to the east moving to the right or south. i watched the object for a moment or two, then the small light went in the opposite direction to the left or north. i was astonished. i kept watching while the light again changed directions six more times, back and forth. then the light instantly grew into a larger appearing bright white light for three seconds or so. then it seamed to impode and it went dark, only to reappear again a short distance to the south. the light traved a much longer distance south, down the coast until it almost could not be seen. then it changed direction again to the north and it appeard to come closer to me. at about the same spot where it turned bright, the light changed to a deep red color while continuing slowly to the north. the light then kept moving north, and away from me, becoming dimmer and dimmer until it could no longer be seen. at no time did the light make any noise. i felt an intelligence connected to the light due to instantly changing directions numerous times and changing colors. i could not tell how faw away the object was nor could i see any shape. at the time of this sighting, my girlfriend beth was taking a shower. when she got out i told her of seeing a ufo. we both looked for awhile but it did not reappear. i was the only witness without any form of camera or video. sincerely, britt nelson.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A floating, soundless star-like object that changed colors and changed opposite directions with ease

content.detailedDescription:
On january 1st 2008 at approximately 11 am. in santa barbara california i noticed a bright object in the sky at about 75 degrees above ground level if one were to consider 90 degrees directly overhead. weather conditions were bright and clear with blue skies and some very patchy, high, thin, hazy and mostly transparent clouds. the clouds were not as high as cirrus clouds but they appeared quite high and were much higher than what one would call coastal haze.
 the brightness of the object caught my attention through the window as it was quite intense somewhat like a bright star at night or the landing lights on a plane at dusk. this was however quite out of the ordinary as it was a very bright sunny day. the object also appeared to be still in the sky. after staring at it for a while and asking my friend to take a look and tell me what he thought it might be  i went outside for a better view.
 i was visiting my friend and asked it he had any binoculars but he didn���t so i was left to scrutinize the object with my naked eyes. i am a visual artist and an avid birder so my observation skills are fairly strong.
 it was to the north of my position and the sun would have been to the south east. the object was moving in a straight line from east to west very slowly. i could observe that it was traveling just beneath the high clouds as it would occasionally dip slightly into them. when i was viewing it through the some what dirty window i noticed that it would disappear and then reappear with the same intensity. i thought that perhaps it was becoming obscured by the clouds. however when seen from outside the house i could see that when it was not shining with a bluish light it would turn completely black as in pure black and not at all grayish as it might have been if there were some atmospheric interference. in it���s black phase i got the impression that it was shaped somewhat like a very shallowly curved fingernail clipping with the con caved side down, the convex side up and pointed on the ends. 
 i am not an aviation expert but i believe i could safely say that no conventional aircraft could fly that slowly except for an ultra light and i don���t think that ultra lights fly at such high altitudes. there was an airliner flying above it and it���s rate of movement across the sky was much faster than object in question even thought the air liner was at a much higher altitude. i considered that if it were an ultra light the top side of the wing might be made of a highly reflective material such as a blue tinted mylar while the bottom was either non reflective or simply not catching the light. in that case it would have had to be changing it���s degree of tilt in relation to my point of observation in order to cause the on and off effect. however it���s trajectory looked straight, slow and steady.
  when lighted it seemed to be emitting light just like a bright star but i wondered if it might not simply be reflecting the sun.
 as the object moved far into the west and eventually went out of sight it continued to appear as thought the light were emitted from it. im not sure if anything could change it���s position that much relative to my point of observation and still reflect the sun with the same intensity directly to my eyes. i have never seen anything like it and i���ll be watching for other reports about it.
content.summary: Bright shining star like object flying high and slow in broad daylight over santa barbara california

content.detailedDescription: At around 12:20 am local time (3:20 gmt) 1/1/2008. my wife an i saw a read light, like a star but changing brightness from very dim to very bright, even brighter that sirius. the color changed from very dip red to orange/yellow. a few minutes after i went into the house to see if someone reported an astronomic event to explain this phenomenon. this light show up bellow the taurus constellation (north-east), at around 20-30 digress above the horizon. during my laptop booting process i went out to verify the object, but for my surprise i found another light with the same characteristics at our north around 30 digress above horizon. then my wife show me another abject with the same characteristics moving from south to north that pass just above zenith to about the same location that the other lights were. we also notice that the north and the north-east lights were moving slowly. the north-east light was moving west. after 1am i went out several times and didn't see anything else. no noise during this events. many years as an amateur astronomer and artificial satellite viewer and never saw something like this. any explanation?
content.summary: Chile - 3 red-yellow bright moving lights close to orion/taurus

content.detailedDescription: Approximately june 2006, midday around 1 or 2pm on a saturday or sunday afternoon, my girlfriend and i were lounging on the roof deck of our apartment building in lower manhattan���s financial district. i was listening to my ipod while looking up at the sky which was crystal clear blue with no clouds when i noticed a tiny silver round object hovering above. the object was at such a high altitude that it was hard to keep my eye on it. it moved slowly in a south-east direction but would stop and hover completely motionless every so often. i pointed it out to my girlfriend who found it hard to see at first because of the high altitude. she eventually saw it as well. we watched it for a little longer and eventually ignored it as it was hard to track with the naked eye. we are both professionals living and working in manhattan and really have no reason to fabricate this story.
content.summary: Silver sphere over lower manhattan financial district

content.detailedDescription:
A star like object was observed in the north east, at about 60 to 70 degrees above the horizon.  the attached video was taken using a max 10x optical zoom minidv camera.  the object was also observed using a telescope, 10x binoculars (hand held and shaky), and photos taken using 3x max optical zoom camera.  through the telescope, the object appears as a silver ball, but with a pendulum with a silver chord attached to a small ball at the end.  the pendulum moved back and forth and around the object.  the attached video was cut from the original size (12 minutes).  the object moved slowly during filming, and was stopped shortly due to interference from a tree.

the similar object was observed two days before, but it abruptly exploded.  the explosion resembled fireworks.  no video was taken, but a video of a similar explosion can be viewed on youtube (http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=-cewh99f0k0).  the pendulum is hard to see on the youtube video, but it is there.

the object was seen again on dec. 4, but as only a beautiful silver ball, with no pendulum.
content.summary: Star like object with pendulum

content.detailedDescription:
<<a massive, black, flattened rounded rectangle cruises slowly along the 101 freeway in santa maria (vandenberg air force base adjacent) every weekend (sat & sun) @ dusk & will "interact" with civilians whom "greet" it by turning a spotlight on you. but, my instinct is that it is ours!>>

   i had never seen a ufo before; and not for lack of trying... i am a 32 year old commercial illustrator/storyboard artist that decided to leave hollywood & become a lawyer. so, i enrolled in law school in san luis opisbo & have classes on the weekends. i have an "unacclimated" new home there, but, i still come "home" to l.A. after class to visit with family & my girlfriend &, studies permitting, an occasional storyboard job.  
   after classes on december 01, 2007 (sunday), i was 30 minutes into my commute back to l.A. when nothing special happened... literally... that is, at first... 
at 5:30pm, i was traveling southbound on the 101 (2 lane) freeway/highway in santa maria (southern san luis obispo county) just east of vandenberg air force base when a bright light on the horizon caught my eye. dusk had just begun.
the terrain is composed of virgin, rolling hills with golden meadows speckled with an occasional oak... nothing out there but land; few, if any, homes; some agriculture... so, when this bright light showed up i jokingly, yet lucidly and with purpose said in my mind "hello, are you a ufo?"  instantly, it turned one of its two, bright, spotlights on me & i took pause...  o...K...
   when the light "hit me," i flinched even though it was some 20 miles away! my first thought was that it was a big neptune helicopter (we just had the fires) with its "spot" on the distant 101 (me). it appeared to be just off the left of the road, on top of a hill, yet far away. i have an automatic apprehension when spotlights are trained on me since, growing up in la, it usually means a car chase is about to cross your path... so, in order to stay alive in koreatown, one must note these things. the light lingered on me for a couple minutes & then averted & began searching immediatly below it.
   time passed, the light got dimmer since it wasn't trained on me anymore, so i could see more detail: i could see 2 distinct shafts of light (2 huge spotlights) searching around from this point on the horizon.
at this point i thought that it must be an vandenberg afb security exercise: their aircraft or a landing tower/ beacon so i forgot about it....
20 minutes pass, its looming ever closer.  "whoa, thats no tower, its 2000 ft off the top of the hill," i said out loud to myself. it was dusk, but the sky was still bright enough to clearly see a silloutte.
    it was huge. it was flying slowly.  how slow, i don't know: a) i was driving 65 mph, b) it was following the 101, but "crawling" north @ what seemed like 15 mph.
must be a helicopter... nope, way too big, no noise, as far as i can hear (at this point i tried to pull over, alas, there was no shoulder & no offramps for 6 or so miles... argghhh!!! figures...
i slowed down to a crawl... luckily the traffic was nonexistent except for the distant lights of approaching cars from miles away; behind me and in front...
must be a blimp..A freakishly huge, flat, rounded rectangle blimp... the spotlights were off when i approached along beside it...
   i really thought it was ours: its lights  seemed to be normal aircraft lights arranged in the "cross" formation ( a couple lite blue strobes on top): 
 "what the hell are you?" i screamed out loud...
instantly (before i even finished the sentence), the huge spotlight trained on me & 2 seconds later i lost sight of it since it was directly above me...
it made me so frustrated. i always wanted to see a ufo, i always thought "if i could just see one, i'll never have doubt..." b.S.... i saw one & i have more questions than ever...
i sped ahead to the off ramp, got off & got back on racing north:
i had to get a photo.
waited 2 more hours in santa maria in a field until hypothermia set in.. i got back on the road. 
wouldn't u know it; i saw it again but this time it was at a much higher altitude (like it was mocking me!)
   about 3 weeks later, the very next time i was driving at dusk on the weekend (back to l.A.) the same thing happened. my father & i were driving together back to l.A. after seeing my new place. he was driving. in the same exact spot it did the same exact thing!
it's m.O:  it slowly cruises over the 101 freeway right next to vandenberg afb & shines its spot on one, that is, if one decides to "greet it." since my dad is a staunch skeptic, i kept my mouth shut for 20 minutes as we got closer.   this time , when we were about a mile away, i said, "dad, thats a ufo..." 
before pops could muster a "gaffaw,"  the a.R.V. turned its massive spotlight on us for 2 seconds & went out again (it truly was blinding) (the big lights had been off for the whole sighting thus far).  
i was able to crane my head out of the passenger window long enough to really get a good long look at it from directly beneath. 
it was a black, rounded rectangle with detail (not smooth). to the direct aft of the ship was an illuminated area that was reminiscent of the "aft" hanger on a modern air craft carrier when it is open. it was hard to gauge the size of the ship since i don't know the altitude & i had no size reference...
that being said, it blocked out the cobalt skies of dusk with a massive blackness; the likes of which haven't been seen since mr.T's debut in "a-team." (serioulsy though, i will take a lie detector test)... but that shant be neccessary, since i have a strong inclination that this phenomena occurs every weekend @ dusk over the 101 in santa maria next to vandenberg afb. ( it has been there the last two times i have traveled that stretch at that time...) i hope anybody near there will look for themselves...
perhaps the government is trying to gauge public reaction, who knows?
if piloted by "man," how could it react to my thoughts:
i think it has something to do with the "trip-seat" technology from montauk lore ("jump-room" technology, etc).  project camelot.Com seems to have some very good whistleblower information for those "ready": i.E.: henry deacon, jim spark, gordon novel, etc testimony.  anybody have any ideas how one of "our" "pilots" could "read minds?" 
please see for yourself!!!!!! i can"t be the only one! there were hundreds of cars that saw this!!!  
i am going to be ready with a charged/cued camera next time!  i somehow "know" i will photograph this thing... just a matter of time. until then...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.shape: Chevron,  Oval,  Square,  Rectagular,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Every weekend @ dusk!!! rounded rectangle- massive- like clockwork!

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work on december 28th, 2007 at approximately 5:30 pm, when i noticed a bright orange colored light slowly moving toward me, coming in from over the lake and almost paralleling the highway. at first i thought it may be a jet, but then realized that it had no blinking lights, and it was not traveling on the typical jet route. seeing as i was only four blocks from home, i pulled into my driveway and continued staring at the object. as soon as i jumped out of my truck, i heard someone say, "i am glad that i am not the only one seeing this." i don't think i even replied, as i was too intense,  analyzing what i was seeing. the object was flying fairly low, just above a low layer of clouds, which distorted the image from time to time. i could not see the stars. the object was about as big as a pencil eraser held out at arms length. as the object passed overhead, it was difficult to tell if what i was seeing was a ball of fire, or possibly it was crescent shaped. the clouds diffused the light it was emitting. the color was a rich orange, the color of fire, but probably even more of a dark orange-ish red. it took about two minutes for the object to fly overhead, and then another two minutes before it quickly disappeared. there was no sound from a plane, helicopter or jet. i called a relative on my cell and told him to look up as it approached his home, which was about a half mile away. he saw the same thing i saw. but when he finally saw it, from where he was, it appeared to go straight up and out of sight. from where i was it appeared to disappear going away from me and slightly up to the left into the atmosphere. i raced into my house to try to find a digital camera. when i finally returned, the object was quite a distance away, still orange, but now appearing only as large as a planet. i took a photo of the object in the dark night sky. what i captured only appears like a speck of light, and that is only after i enhanced the photo to lighten the image substantially. from where i first saw the object, it was probably two miles away, and that is being generous, from my home. i took about two minutes to fly overhead. it was not directly overhead. it was probably moving at 60 miles per hour or less. the neighbor, who i still have not identified yet, tried shooting fireworks at the object, probably to get its attention. it continued on at this slow rate of speed,until it went another two miles, when it went out of sight. during the sighting, i pretty much just concentrated on staring at the object, looking for any thing that could help describe it. from the onset, i had thought about running in to find a camera, but i did not want to miss visualizing any of the sighting. this was my first. if i am ever fortunate enough to witness another sighting, i will definitely attempt to capture the sighting on camera at the soonest possible moment. after the object disappeared, i called the relative and re-played the sighting with him. he had seen something similar about 10 years ago, and said that the color was exactly the same, the rich orange fire-like color. it was a brief incident.
content.summary: Slow moving ufo, the color of fire, passes over cordova alaska

content.detailedDescription:
A witness  (wishes to remain anonymus) was going into home when he got out of his car and walking down his driveway when he saw a light coming from an unseen object(no red or green lights) fly from n.E to south east about horizontal(about 60 degrees from the horizon) to orions belt go into cloud cover. the object was flying over 25,000 feet.That is where the cloud cover was according to  uswx.Com given to me by the pease international airport operation center. the sky cover(clouds) were broken @ 25,00 feet. they had no aircraft on their radar and no aircraft in the air. the objects light when last seen was turning to the south east and was about the size of a pea at arms length. the azimuth reading at last sight was about 160 degrees and heading directly over the line of sight where the  airbase was located. it should be noted that the airbase is about 3/4 mile form the pisacataqua river.
the observer states that the light looked like a car head light shining into a cloud and was some what cone shaped > pattern.  no noise or landing lights or red or green lights or sound was heard at any time. it just disappeared in the light cloud cover.
when he walked into the house he stated that he never had seen anything like  it in his over 35 years on the nh seacoast.
           submitted by art champoux mufon investigator
content.summary: Light like a headlight of a car shining  across sky

content.detailedDescription:
Whilst setting off fireworks to welcome in the new year (this actually happened on the 1st of january 0:10 hours - sort the site out). we observed several orange lights rising in the sky in a westerly direction. they tracked overhead, not losing altitude and not fading. they eventually dwindled upwards. we observed several lights, some in a  formation. there were no white, green and red lights, no jet or piston engined noise!

also the final two, one rose vertically, one tracked horzontally, heading northwards from the point of origin. once again no lights were visible or engine noise heard. they were the wrong colour for distress flares, no accompanying explosions were heard which would suggest fireworks. just these lights. i am a keen aircraft spotter. so can discount known aircraft. also i have seen the iss, this was not that. at one point there were more than 10 of these light sources in the sky.

i had been drinking, but not enough so that my comprehesions was affected. the travelling lights did not appear to be flares or fireworks. they were not aircraft. it was a swarm. they faded, travelling upwards! i want to know what the hell these were! unfortunately none of us had a camera on us, i wish i did!
content.summary: Light sources

content.detailedDescription:
Shortly after my neighborhood finished with new years fire works i went out front of my house and looked toward the west, south west where orion was and mars north of orion. where then i and several other witnesses saw a low moving object which was glowing a bright orange.  it was traveling due west at a low altitude.  there were no blinking lights only a orange glow which seemed to surround the object which was moving at a slow speed compared to most planes i see from the airport which is in concord ca.  this was absolutely not an airplane or helicopter as i see them every day and night due to airport activity!  my guess is that this object or craft was observing the activity of fireworks going off all around my city and the surrounding areas!!

if you receive any information on this sighting i would like to be informed.

thank you,

ted h.

p.S.  the object made no sound. traveled in a straight line and went out of sight behind my house as i was standing in the middle of my street out front.
content.summary: Orange glowing object moving due west at about 1000-1500 feet.

content.detailedDescription: I was'nt but ten going on eleven years old when i wen't outside on our front porch after my grandpa and i came in from picking watermelons in our watermelon field! we did not get newspapers for we lived in the country. closest big town was searcy, ark. 32 miles away. anyway, i was standing on our front porch looking at our cows in the pasture, when out of nowhere, i heard a whirring sound. i looked and seen nothing but heard the wirring sound, all of a sudden the rotating disk silver in color landed in the pasture in front of me (no more than 60-70 feet), so as young as i was i saw it very clearly and will never forget it! i had never heard of a ufo in my life nor did i know what one was. all i know is that i had seen what i saw and never saw one before, nor have i seen one since! back to what i saw, after the disk landed in our pasture, a ladder came down from inside the craft and i watched in shock and curiosity. before i knew it,(iwas seeing who or what was going to come down the ladder) but instantly the ladder went back up, the whinning got loud and the disk shot up and disappered! never seen it again1 i wish i could have the oppurtunity to go aboard one of their crafts! i would not be afraid of them. for i figure that they let me get a glimpse of them for a reason, what, i do not know!I wish i could go aboard one their crafts and maybe live amoung them! i am 53 years old now and will never forget what i saw and still would like to join them wherever they are from!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Round with lights flashing at bottom going around and round, silverish color disk.I

content.detailedDescription: My son and i just purchased a pizza and we were returning home when when my son yelled out "look!"  "over there" ...."its the phoenix lights".  we were going east on cactus about to hit 35th ave. he is really into ufos and the like so i'm always debunking his sightings. this one was a cluster of lights though and caught my attention. so i began to pay closer attention. the lights  in the sky were stationary for a while. there was one light in the middle that blinked like a plane's, but then a row of 4-5 lights on both sides of the blinking one would light up. then they would one by one go off  meanwhile the blinking one would stay lit. there was no particular pattern either. they would sometimes go in a series ,1,2,3,4,5, on both sides and then all off. i thought it might have been a blimp, but then it started to move to the east rather rapidly much faster than any blimp. i gave him credit for actually being right this time. we watched it for a few minutes and went and purchased his sparkling cider and went home to watch a movie.After we purchased the cider we could no longer see the lights so we went home. 3rd event i've witnessed since living in phoenix. the other two were with numerous people too. crazy place/time to live.
content.summary: Lights in northern sky going from one bright blinking to many in a row.

content.detailedDescription:
until recently i just assumed that this object was a stealthy american military craft, but now i'm not so sure, this is why i am so long to announce it.
      on approx. date given i was at a neighbors ( inlaws ) house outside. this was a nice , sunny summer day. there were 4-5 people that witnessed this. two are deceased now. we were just standing outside talking by the vehicles when suddenly the area got almost completely dark. i looked up to see where the sun went and there was the biggest black triangular thing i have ever seen almost directly overhead at this point. it was so low and so large that i could barely see the edges of it. i did not see any markings or lights. it's been so long that i sort of forget any other outstanding characteristics about it, except that it was almost silent. i did hear something, almost like it was the sound of what the air would have sounded like with something this large passing through it. it was not an engine sound, just a whirring sound kink of. my first thought was that this was a stealth military jet that was gliding with engines off, but it occurred to me that maybe it was in trouble and was looking for a place to land. this being a foothills, mountainous area there were not many places something like this could land nearby, except there was a hay field a few miles away. my almost immediate reaction was to jump in the car and drive fast to this field to see it land. a few of us jumped in the car and got there in about 5 minutes. there was nothing there when we got there. i did not see this again or hear anything about it ever.....This object was going so slow i couldn't understand how it could stay in the air. all of my actions took place from the time i saw the craft to about the time it was done passing overhead. 
     until now this has just been a good campfire story other than i did also about 6 months ago reported  the same story to the brian vike ufo research web site. i have for just a few years now gained more interest in the ufo phenomena so i have been reading several books and looking online and have found several reports from other people that seem to be nearly identical to what i have seen. i wish i could remember the exact date so this could be traced back to the time to see if it truly was one of ours.... that's my story and i'm sticking to it. i hope no men in black will come to visit me now.
content.summary: Black triangular ship passed directly overhead, very low altitude ( approx.200-300 ft. )

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming in to san francisco airport on dec. 9th, 2007, at 7 pm, on continental airlines flight co41, from newark, new jersey, to visit my family after my first semester away at college. i had a window seat on the left side of the plane, so i was looking at the east coast of san francisco bay. we were between 1-3 thousand feet high, so individual streetlights were becoming easier to make out. while i was looking out the window, i saw it.

it appeared to me to be a pulsing white light a few feet under the surface of the water, moving slower than the plane, but still moving. it was perhaps between 10 and 30 feet across (size was constant; i'm just not that good at judging sizes from a plane). it would pulse a white light, with a slow frequency (i.E. it took about 10 seconds to cycle from bright light to pitch black to bright light again, with both dark and light times being the same length). it also gave off some kind of (for lack of a better word) whispy tail into the air that was roughly twice the width of the object in height. this "tail" would only appear when the light was on. i watched the object for about 5 minutes, at which time i lost sight of it because we moved beyond it. at the time i lost sight of it, though, it seemed to be doing the same thing it had been doing when i first saw it: moving slowly south along the coast and pulsing under the water.

when i first saw it, it was interesting to me. i hadn't seen any airplane or helicopter that looked like that, or any boat or sub that acted in that way, so that was the reason i watched it. i used to live on an island, so i know what boats look like, and my parents house is 5 minutes away from our county airport, so i know the patterns of lights produced by airplanes because they fly over the house all the time. this was one big pulsing white light that was under the surface, and unlike anything i'd ever seen before. it is a uso in the sense that it was submerged and i was unable to identify it.

during the sighting, i was at first curious as i was expecting, like all the other times i've seen something strange in the sky or on the ocean, to identify this object within a few seconds as a plane or boat or something else mundane. my curiosity was noticeably piqued as a result of this encounter, so i watched it intently, and after i had watched it long enough to know that it was unlike anything i had ever seen (i spent a minute or two of the sighting trying to identify it and failing), i switched into "this is something i can't explain" mode and started observing just as a scientist would observe an experiment; not applying any bias, or judgement; just watching. after i lost sight of it i immediately thought of how awesome it was that i'd finally seen a ufo (well, uso, but i'm not picky), and i couldn't wait to report it to mufon. 

that's about the gist of my report. i know i'm not a trained observer, but i like to consider myself an amateur armchair ufologist, and this has reaffirmed my notion that there is something going on that isn't being adressed by the world at large. i hope my report helps mufon in convincing people that something is happening.
content.summary: Whispy object emitting light under the surface of the water travelling along the eastern cost of san francisco bay

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling, almost positive i was in fl.  (june 23,2006) i took 3 beautiful sunset pics and about a wk ago, i put one on my computer screen for wallpaper.
i hadn't noticed them before, just glancing thru my pics but on my screen, they really stood out.
content.summary: 3 ufo's

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down homedale when i saw this cone shaped fireball that started flashing shorly after... this went on on for a few minutes and then just dissapeared after i squeezed off a few rounds...
content.summary: Scared me and i thought i was going to be abducted

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving my 9 passenger station wagon to north hills mall. my girlfriend,carolyn and  her 2 kids 9 & 8 and my 3 kids 9,8,and 5 were topping a slight elevation on mcknight road heading s. to north hills mall. the hovering disk was in front of us as we got to the hilltop,about 1/2 mile  from the mall. i said "wow" look at that! ohmygosh.It's a flying saucer "(or something to that effect)  and pulled off to the side of the road. i had an adrenalin rush, was excited but there was a fear factor too. an incredibility trance, staring at it.   but i felt safe with us all in the car, together.  it looked exactly like 2 saucers ;one upside down, on top and one ,right-side up. it looked like there was a narrow band between the two with lights; either blinking or there was a rotation giving the illusion of blinking. the disk was black or charcoal in the night sky. it hovered. moving back and forth and back and forth and a slight up and down. it even moved slightly over mcknight road towards kaufman's (separate) store.  we were speechless. pamela, carolyn's 9 year old got very upset and was crying "i'm scared. i'm scared" . i encouraged the kids to keep looking because it was something none of us would ever ever forget. it looked quite large over this smaller 1960's type mall, probably covering 1/4th of it. it was not high in the sky, looking to be about 400 yards over the mall. we watched it for about 20 seconds. carolyn told me 'let's get going, pam is upset".  all of a sudden it took a slight swoop and then off in a slanted s.W. direction straight up into the sky and was gone! took off so fast and was not visable so fast it took our breath away. another car had pulled off the road behind us to watch this. we quieted the kids and proceeded to the mall.When i got home around 9 i told my husband about it. his brother, a priest from e. pa. was visiting as i told them both. i said i was going to call the t.V. news station. my husband was  v.P. in a financial institution in a small town; and said he did not want any embarrasing notoriety with me calling some t.V. station and looking stupid.   because #1 he didn't believe me, thought i was exaggerating or mis identifying what i had seen and #2 he did not want 'his family' to be 'made fun of' if my story hit the news. even though the kids told him the story they were too young for him to give them any credibility.  i was anxious to watch the evening news but there was no mention of it.Nothing???  i could not believe anything that big and visual in such a busy place as mcknight road before christmas would not have been seen and reported by someone. mcknight road was full of traffic. but --- it was 1967. there was nothing in the paper the next day either.?? i still cannot believe it was not reported. i am wondering if the car that pulled off the road behind us ever called anyone.? what were they thinking? 
over the years i have told the story occasionally. there is no way anyone can ever discredit or 'take away'  what i saw. it was not one of those 'dancing, flashing lights way up in the sky that people have photographed and called a ufo . it was large, close, pulsating,  and we could see details. it's 'exit' defies words.   i have wanted to share this sighting for decades. thanks for giving me this opportunity.  it is still very visable in my mind.
content.summary: Very close, blinking or rotating lights, hovered, sped off fast & out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
While working as a start-up field engineer on the old gulf of canada big refinery at the front ocean side of the canso straight -- i used to drive up to the highest point reachable by road at the time ( within 5 miles of the refinery complex, again facing the ocean )usually after midnite to get good radio reception from boston to listen to the baseball scores as i was a big pirates fan at the time. 99 % of the time one or more of my associates came with me,but on this particular night i was by myself. i was half asleep playing with the car radio to get the station's reception --- when no more than 200 to 300 yards in front of me out from the ocean shoots at a very steep angle a bright reddish - orange glowing oval like object about 100 ft long and say 20-30 ft in diameter at its' center. when it got up in the air a couple hundred ft,i swear it shook itself to shed all of the sea water. then it came toward me on the shore and hovered right above me,i was scared and dove to the floor of my car so it looked like no one was in the car,i hoped.  after a lifetime to me,it finally shot away up into the night sky  at a high rate of speed with a combination high shrill whizzing with a loud lower tone buzzing sound.
needles to say i quickly drove back to the motel near port hastings on the trans canada highway where i was staying. i never went back to that spot again,even after not finding another good radio reception spot. i had to read the ball scores 2 weeks late when the boston sunday edition newspaper got up to us.
content.summary: I saw an oval ufo  about 100 ft long and 30 ft in diameter at its' center exit the ocean at a steep angle.
